name: Geo Hypostasis
desc:
Code name: Gimel. A high-purity Geo entity.
Elemental hypostases are ultra-compact structures with a high mass.
Concentrated elemental energy forms a solid shell around the core of the hypostasis, leaving only the core reactive to elemental stimuli.

customize.text: Elemental creatures who protect themselves from incoming attack with their durable shell. Find an opportune moment to land a blow to their <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> . They are able to create <color=#ffe14b>Geo constructs</color> in fights and restore their health when they feel threatened. You must be able to efficiently destroy these constructs if you want to defeat these creatures.

<color=#ffd780>Juggernaut</color>
Crush all of a Geo Hypostasis' Rock Pillars of Revival before it can be revived.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>A House Ill-Founded</color>
Cause the same Geo Hypostasis to fall three times by destroying the Basalt Column that it is on.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>None Stand Secure</color>
Force the Geo Hypostasis into its revival state without destroying any Basalt Columns.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>You Have to Hit the Pillars</color>
Defeat a Geo Hypostasis in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Basalt Pillar
dropMaterial.desc:
A pillar formed by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis, composed of high-density Geo energy.
It is a testament to Geo's status as the heaviest of the elements. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this pillar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

dropMaterial.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.
This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."
